page.title: 01RELIGION IN HARLOW
page.content: {Harlow}has a wide variety of churches and halls. There are nine{Anglican churches, one{Disabled Christian {Fellowship,}and five{Evangelical {Churches.}There is also one{Seventh {Day Adventist Church}, five{Jehovah's {Witnesses}halls, one{Jewish}hall and two{Methodist}churches.Also there are three{Pentecostal}churches,one {Redeemer Lutheran}church. Two{Roman {Catholic}churches and one{Salvation {Army}hall. Also one Society of {Friends (Quakers),}two{Spiritualist halls. One{Church Of Jesus Christ of {Latter Day Saints,}one{Torch Christian {Fellowship}with a{Junior Torch}and a{United Reform Church.}In addition to this there are{Baptist, Baha'i Faith, {Buddist}and{Christian Science Churches.
